text: The Johns Hopkins Hospital (JHH) is the teaching hospital and biomedical research of the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine, located in Baltimore, Maryland, in the U.S. It was founded in 1889 by Johns Hopkins. It is thought to be one of the greatest hospitals in the world. It was ranked by U.S. News & World Report news magazine as the best overall hospital in America for 21 years (1991â€“2011). ==References== Category:University hospitals in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Baltimore Category:Johns Hopkins University
title: Johns Hopkins Hospital
